original_text: O foolish Galatians! Who has bewitched you? It was before your eyes that Jesus Christ was publicly portrayed as crucified.
korean_text: 어리석도다 갈라디아 사람들아 예수 그리스도께서 십자가에 못 박히신 것이 너희 눈 앞에 밝히 보이거늘 누가 너희를 꾀더냐

sentences.original_text: that Jesus Christ was publicly portrayed as crucified.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수 그리스도께서 십자가에 못 박히신 것이 공개적으로 전시되었다.
